CustomField.description: Set by Owner via User Record
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL (Owner.Sales_Organisation_Name__c ,"Fifty"), "Fifty", IF( ISPICKVAL (Owner.Sales_Organisation_Name__c ,"UK"), "UK", IF( ISPICKVAL (Owner.Sales_Organisation_Name__c ,"Italy"), "Italy","" )))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Set by Owner via User Record
CustomField.label: Sales Org Name
